item.title: Prj - Times of India epub
item.description: Remember my old post about the TOI - Epub project? Yesterday, I published the source on github. If anyone still interested, go ahead and take a look at the source.

item.title: RIL2Insta - Import Read it Later links to Instapaper
item.description: One of my long time wish to write a Chrome extension completed last week. It all started when my answer was down-voted at apple.
